nodes.text: Maseloo, known as Honest Maseloo to his customers, was a male Rodian who worked as a weapon modifications merchant during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. During the war, he operated a stall in the Alien Enclave Market of the city Voss-Ka on the planet Voss. Maseloo wore brown and gray clothing while at his stall and spoke a language other than basic to customers. He had green skin, no hair and purple eyes.

Maseloo first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, an MMORPG released by BioWare in 2011. In the game he serves as a Republic and Imperial weapon mods vendor on the planet Voss. His location is also marked on a map in Prima Games' Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide.
